perturbation.original_text: Schoolpop shall pay AEIS all incurred penalties within thirty (30) days of receipt of invoice for such penalties by AEIS.
perturbation.changed_text: Schoolpop shall pay AEIS all incurred penalties within sixty (60) days of receipt of invoice for such penalties by AEIS.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by modifying the payment deadline for penalties from 30 days to 60 days, creating ambiguity and uncertainty regarding the enforcement of the payment term.

perturbation.original_text: AEIS shall review all submissions within seven (7) business days.
perturbation.changed_text: AEIS shall review all submissions within fourteen (14) business days.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by modifying the review period to 14 business days, which was originally seven (7) business days, creating ambiguity and uncertainty regarding the turnaround time.

perturbation.original_text: Schoolpop agrees to an annual review to take place forty-five (45 days) prior to each contract anniversary, on or about June 15th of each contract year.
perturbation.changed_text: Schoolpop agrees to an annual review to take place thirty (30 days) prior to each contract anniversary, on or about June 15th of each contract year.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by modifying the review period to 30 days, which was originally forty-five (45 days), creating ambiguity and uncertainty regarding the turnaround time.
